languages.text: "Анализ ситуации указывает на чрезмерный численный перевес врага. В открытой конфронтации благословенный Амарнат может пострадать от случайного или намеренного выстрела. У меня есть альтернатива прямой схватке".

"My analysis of the situation indicates the overwhelming numerical superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative proposal to direct engagement."
languages.original_text: "Анализ ситуации указывает на чрезмерный численный перевес врага. В открытой конфронтации благословенный Амарнат может пострадать от случайного или намеренного выстрела. У меня есть альтернатива прямой схватке".

traits.locale_text: "My analysis of the situation points to overwhelmingly greater enemy numbers. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative for head-on engagement."

"My analysis of the situation points to overwhelmingly greater enemy numbers. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative for head-on engagement."

"My analysis of the situation indicates an overwhelmingly superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative for head-on engagement."

"My analysis of the situation indicates an overwhelmingly superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative for head-on engagement."

"My analysis of the situation indicates the overwhelming numerical superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative proposal to direct engagement."

"My analysis of the situation indicates the overwhelming numerical superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative proposal to direct engagement."

languages.text: "Meine Analyse der Situation deutet auf eine überwältigende zahlenmäßige Überlegenheit des Feindes hin. In einer offenen Konfrontation könnte der gesegnete Amarnat zufällig oder absichtlich durch Feuer verletzt werden. Ich habe einen alternativen Vorschlag anstelle eines frontalen Kampfes."
languages.original_text: "My analysis of the situation indicates the overwhelming numerical superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative proposal to direct engagement."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Analyse der Situation deutet auf eine überwältigende Überlegenheit des Feindes hin. In einer offenen Konfrontation könnte der gesegnete Amarnat zufällig oder absichtlich durch Feuer verletzt werden. Ich habe eine Alternative zu einem frontalen Kampf."

languages.text: « Mon analyse de la situation indique une supériorité numérique écrasante en faveur de l'ennemi. En conflit ouvert, Amarnat le béni risque de subir des brûlures, volontairement ou non. Cela dit, il existe une alternative à l'engagement frontal. »
languages.original_text: "My analysis of the situation indicates the overwhelming numerical superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative proposal to direct engagement."

traits.locale_text: « Mon analyse de la situation indique une supériorité écrasante de l'ennemi. En conflit ouvert, Amarnat le béni risque de subir des brûlures, volontairement ou non. Cela dit, il y a une alternative dans le cas d'un engagement frontal. »

languages.text: “局势分析显示，敌人在数量上拥有绝对优势。如果发生正面交锋，蒙福者阿玛纳特可能会被流弹击中，或遭到蓄意枪击。我有个备选计划，可以避免正面冲突。”
languages.original_text: "My analysis of the situation indicates the overwhelming numerical superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative proposal to direct engagement."

traits.locale_text: “局势分析显示，敌人目前处于绝对优势。如果发生正面交锋，蒙福者阿玛纳特可能会被流弹击中，或遭到蓄意枪击。我有个备选方案，可以避免正面冲突。”

languages.text: 「状況を分析したところ、圧倒的に敵が数的に優位だと算出されました。あからさまに対立すれば、祝福されたアマルナトが無作為もしくは意図的に火の攻撃を受けることになりかねません。直接戦闘に代わる案があります」
languages.original_text: "My analysis of the situation indicates the overwhelming numerical superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative proposal to direct engagement."

traits.locale_text: 「状況を分析したところ、圧倒的に敵が数的に優位だと算出された。あからさまに対立すれば、祝福されたアマルナトは、意図せずともしようとも火の攻撃を受けることになるだろう。だが、直接戦闘する代わりに別の案がある」

languages.text: «Mi análisis de la situación indica una abrumadora superioridad numérica del enemigo. En un combate abierto, el bendito Amarnat puede ser dañado por el fuego de forma aleatoria o a propósito. Tengo una alternativa al enfrentamiento directo».
languages.original_text: "My analysis of the situation indicates the overwhelming numerical superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative proposal to direct engagement."

traits.locale_text: «Mi análisis de la situación indica una abrumadora superioridad del enemigo. En un enfrentamiento abierto, el bendito Amarnat puede ser dañado por el fuego de forma aleatoria o a propósito. Tengo una alternativa al combate frontal».

languages.text: "Duruma dair tahlilim, düşmanın sayıca ezici üstünlüğe sahip olduğu yönünde. Açıkça muharebeye girmemiz durumunda kutsanmış Amarnat, açılacak ateşle rastgele veya kasıtlı olarak zarar görebilir. Doğrudan çatışmaya girmektense farklı bir yöntem önermek isterim."
languages.original_text: "My analysis of the situation indicates the overwhelming numerical superiority of the enemy. In an open confrontation, the blessed Amarnat may be randomly or deliberately harmed by fire. I have an alternative proposal to direct engagement."

traits.locale_text: "Duruma dair analizim, düşmanın sayıca ezici üstünlüğe sahip olduğu yönünde. Açıkça çatışmaya girmemiz durumunda kutsanmış Amarnat, rastgele veya kasıtlı olarak zarar görebilir. Doğruca çatışmaya girmektense farklı bir yöntem önermek isterim."
